product_title: Hand Made Cotton Nakshi Kantha

detail.name: Hand Made Cotton Nakshi Kantha

details.description_text: Product Type: Nakshi Katha Color: Multi Color It should be unique gift for all Usable for any season Main Material: Cotton Size: 7.5' x 8.5' Nakshi Katha, a type of embroidered quilt, is a centuries-old Bengali art tradition in Bangladesh.The basic material used is thread and old cloth. Kathas are made throughout Bangladesh, but the greater Mymensingh, Rajshahi, Faridpur and Jessore areas are most famous for this craft.The colorful patterns and designs that are embroidered resulted in the name "Nakshi katha", which was derived from the Bengali word "Naksha", which refers to artistic patterns. The early Kathas had a white Background accented with red, blue and black embroidery; later yellow, green, pink and other colors were also included. The running stitch called "Katha stitch" is the main stitch used for the purpose.Traditionally, katha was produced for the use of the family. Today, after the revival of the Nakshi katha, they are produced commercially.

details.description_text: 4Pcs Sheet Fixing Clip Invisible Anti-slip Mattress Four Corner Sheet Fixing Plate Bed Cover Fixing Fixer Sheet Safety Clamp4pcs Invisible Sheet Bed Cover Fixer Multifunctional Fixed Clip Safety Pinless Sheet Bed Sheet Anti-Shift Fixed Magic WeaponProduct Description:This invisible bed sheet holder is a multifunctional bed sheet holder designed to solve the problem of bed sheet shifting and sliding. Whether you frequently flip over while sleeping or have active children at home, this fixator ensures that your bed sheets remain flat at all times, eliminating the need for repeated tidying.Product features:Invisible design: The fixator adopts an invisible design, which is almost invisible after installation, does not affect the appearance of the bed, and keeps the bed clean.Multi functional use: Not only can it be used to fix bed sheets, but it can also be used to fix duvet covers, bed covers, etc., suitable for various bed types such as single beds, double beds, children's beds, etc.No safety pin design: Adopting a no safety pin design, it avoids the safety hazards that traditional pins may bring, especially suitable for households with children or pets.Anti slip and anti displacement: Strong fixation effectively prevents bed sheets from sliding or shifting during sleep, ensuring a comfortable night's sleep.Easy to install and disassemble: The installation is simple, just clip the fastener between the bed sheet and mattress without any tools. Disassembly is equally convenient, making it easy to remove when cleaning bed sheets.Durable Material: Made of high-quality materials that are durable and not easily deformed, they maintain a good fixing effect even after long-term use.Usage method:1.Spread the bed sheet flat on the mattress.2.Clip the fixator onto the four corners or edges of the bed sheet and mattress.3.Adjust the position of the fixator to ensure that the bed sheet is securely fixed.Packing list:Invisible bed sheet holder x 4 piecesMatters needing attention:Do not clamp the fixator on a mattress that is too heavy, as it may affect the fixing effect.Regularly check the fasteners to ensure their firmness.

details.description_text: পণ্যের ধরণঃ বিছানার চাদর। রঙঃ বহু রঙিন । প্রধান উপাদানঃ সুতি। বেডশিটের আকারঃ ৭.৫ x ৮.৫ ফুট বালিশের কভারের আকারঃ ২০x ৩৬ ইঞ্চি রং নষ্ট হবেনা। দীর্ঘস্থায়ী, আরামদায়ক একটি সফ্ট বেডশিট এবং দুইটি মাথার বালিসের কভার থাকবে। হালকা ওজন এবং বাড়িতে ধুয়ে ফেলা সহজ বিছানার সাথে 2 বালিশ কভারের মিল রয়েছে। ফটোগ্রাফিক আলোর উৎস বা আপনার মনিটর সেটিংসের কারণে পণ্যের রং কিছুটা আলাদা হতে পারে।
